column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////We made it by 7:00AM Saturday
column3: there were ALREADY people in there
column4: but we were seated right away. Our waiter was SUPER helpful
column5: telling us the more famous dishes and what people to seem to enjoy more than others. I ordered the Cinnamon Bun pancakes (to DIE for) and my friend ordered the berry pancakes --she loved them as well. I had a caramel latte to drink
column6: and it was probably the best cup of coffee I have ever had in my life. When we left around 8:30 the place didn't have an empty seat
column7: and lines out the door. I heard a party ask for a table of 4 and they said ~2 hours. If you are going to go GET UP EARLY AND GO. Only negative I experienced.
